pages.text: Everything from Pickaxes to Scythes is in this chapter, as well as weapons such as Daggers, Greatswords, and Bows. Most of these can be made from most material types including Metals, Stone, Wood, and more.

pages.title: Knife
pages.text: A fast but small weapon for self defense, also good at harvesting plant Fiber.

pages.title: Dagger
pages.text: Created with a Knife and Claw in a Smithing Table. Faster than a Knife but bad at harvesting plant Fiber.

pages.title: Traveler's Sword
pages.text: Created with a Knife and matching base material in a Smithing Table. Similar to a proper Sword but smaller, faster, and less damaging.

pages.title: Sword
pages.text: A standard sword, used by Knights and Commonfolk alike.

pages.title: Greatsword
pages.text: Created with a Sword and matching base material in a Smithing Table. Similar to a proper Sword but bigger, slower, and more damaging.

pages.title: Axe
pages.text: A standard axe used to strip logs, fell trees, and occasionally in combat.

pages.title: Hatchet
pages.text: A small axe used fell trees, and often in combat by Barbarians.

pages.title: Timbercutter's Axe
pages.text: Created with an Axe and matching base material in a Smithing Table. Incredibly slow in combat but very strong, mostly used for chopping tons of trees.

pages.title: Hoe
pages.text: Used to till Dirt into Farmland for planting crops.

pages.title: Scythe
pages.text: Created with a Hoe and matching base material in a Smithing Table. Great for decapitating mobs and harvesting plant Fiber or Wheat in higher yields.

pages.title: Shovel
pages.text: Used to dig holes, flatten Dirt into Paths, or extinguish Campfires and Braziers.

pages.title: Pulley Bow
pages.text: Created with a Bow and Brasium in a Smithing Table. Further range than a regular Bow.

pages.title: Crossbow
pages.text: A slow but strong ranged weapon.
